name: ai-skills (sanjay3290)
description: [项目级] Collection of agent skills for AI coding assistants。来源: https://github.com/sanjay3290/ai-skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Collection of agent skills for AI coding assistants

来源: https://github.com/sanjay3290/ai-skills
语言: Python
Stars: 85

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: > **[`npx skills`](https://github.com/nicepkg/skills)** — The package manager for the open [Agent Skills](https://agentskills.io) ecosystem. One command to install skills into any AI coding agent.

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: Once installed, skills activate automatically based on your requests. Just ask naturally:

name: ai-skills/skills 模块
description: [模块级] ai-skills 项目的 skills 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/sanjay3290/ai-skills

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content:
[![Ask DeepWiki](https://deepwiki.com/badge.svg)](https://deepwiki.com/sanjay3290/ai-skills)

A collection of portable skills for AI coding assistants. Works with all major AI clients that support the [Agent Skills Standard](https://agentskills.io).
